titles.title: To amend the Water Resources Development Act of 1992 to authorize the Secretary of the Army to reimburse non-Federal interests for managing recreation facilities and natural resources at water resource development projects, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

term.name: Federal aid to water resources development

bill.summary: 5/3/2001--Introduced. Amends the Water Resources Development Act of 1992 to authorize the Secretary of the Army to pay for the non-Federal share of work carried out under the challenge cost-sharing program for the management of recreation facilities and natural resources at water resource development projects by a non-Federal interest if the Secretary has entered into an executed agreement with the non-Federal interest that provides for reimbursement.
